CREATE   PROCEDURE [dbo].[create_procedure]  @procedure NVARCHAR(50),  @sql_statement NVARCHAR(MAX), @params NVARCHAR(500)
AS BEGIN 
    DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX)
    IF EXISTS (SELECT  * FROM [sys].[all_objects] o INNER JOIN sys.schemas s ON s.schema_id=o.schema_id WHERE o.[name]=@procedure AND  s.name='dbo'  AND o.type_desc='SQL_STORED_PROCEDURE'  AND o.is_ms_shipped=0) 
    BEGIN
        SET @sql= N'DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].['+ @procedure +']'            
        EXEC sp_executesql @tsql = @sql;
    END

    SET @sql= N'CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].['+ @procedure +'] ' + @params + CHAR(13)+CHAR(10) +  ' AS BEGIN ' + CHAR(13)+CHAR(10) +  @sql_statement + CHAR(13)+CHAR(10) + ' END'        
    EXEC sp_executesql @tsql = @sql;
END


EXECUTE  [dbo].create_schema  @schema

DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX)
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [sys].[all_views] t INNER JOIN sys.schemas s ON s.schema_id=t.schema_id WHERE t.[name]=@view AND  s.name=@schema)
BEGIN
    SET @sql= N'DROP VIEW ['+@schema+'].['+@view+']'
    EXEC sp_executesql @tsql = @sql;
END

SET @sql= N'CREATE VIEW ['+@schema+'].['+@view+'] AS ' +  @select_statement
EXEC sp_executesql @tsql = @sql;
